plugins.name: Emojis
plugins.description: Allows for inserting emojis via a dropdown. This is the core part of the feature. Add plugins like food emojis and people emojis to fill it with some characters.

plugins.name: Emojis of Places
plugins.description: Adds a basic set with the most popular characters to the emojis feature.

plugins.name: Emojis of smileys and people
plugins.description: Adds the people category and signs to the emojis feature.

plugins.name: Nature Emojis
plugins.description: Adds the nature category and signs to the emojis feature.

plugins.name: Food Emojis
plugins.description: Adds the food category and signs to the emojis feature.

plugins.name: Emojis of activities
plugins.description: Adds the activities category and symbols to the emojis feature.

plugins.name: Emojis of objects
plugins.description: Adds the objects and characters to the emojis feature.

plugins.name: Emojis of flags
plugins.description: Adds the flags to the emojis feature.

plugins.name: Emojis of symbols
plugins.description: Adds the symbols to the emojis feature.
